Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Total β-hCG II Reagent Pack
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Total β-hCG II Calibrators
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Total β-hCG II Range Verifiers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Total β-hCG II assay, calibrators, and range verifiers for quantitative measurement of hCG and its β-subunit in human serum and plasma using the VITROS Immunodiagnostic System.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) and its β-subunit in human serum and plasma (EDTA or heparin) to aid in the early detection of pregnancy; for calibration and calibration range verification of the VITROS Immunodiagnostic System.
